abstract: Stock market has small losses, its fourth consecutive decline.
lead_paragraph: Investors continue to monitor violence in the Middle East and the rapid ascent of the dollar, which is leading companies to cut profit forecasts.

headline.main: Shares Down for 4th Day as Eyes Turn to Mideast
headline.print_headline: Shares Down for 4th Day as Eyes Turn to Mideast

snippet: Investors continue to monitor violence in the Middle East and the rapid ascent of the dollar, which is leading companies to cut profit forecasts.
